name: JUMP by ShevJK
description:
A turtle abandoned by its owner seeks revenge and it must jump through various different kinds of obstacles prepared by the owner. Progressively getting harder the further you go. What will you find at the end?

Context: 
This is one of the first games I have ever made during my school hours. It is a platformer game that is inspired by Jump King. One of my most favorite games of all time. This is currently a prototype and I don't intend on releasing this as a full game anytime soon but if it does garner enough attention, then I will try to update it as regularly as I can.
